author: Jamela Alindogan
title: Philippines virus lockdown affects supply, sale of crops
description: Among the poorest communities in the Philippines farmers struggle to sell as the coronavirus restrictions continue.
content:
Farmers on the northern island of Luzon are facing supply-chain problems because of the partial lockdown against the coronavirus pandemic which has infected more than 4,000 people in the Philippines.
